serious: Simplicity is a feature you ship every day.
You learn faster when you teach sooner.
Direction beats speed when the map is wrong.
Constraints are the artist’s secret superpower.
funny: A meeting is an email that wanted to feel important.
If at first you don’t succeed, rename it v2-final-FINAL.
Sleep is a power-up, not a pause.
Keyboard shortcuts are spells. Learn the incantations.
